name: Souldrinker

skills.name: Razing Hand
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Decreases [Bomb] debuff detonation countdowns by 1 turn.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Damage +5%

skills.name: Raining Fire
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 3 times at random. Decreases [Bomb] debuff detonation countdowns by 1 turn if the target has a [Poison] debuff.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Damage +5%

skills.name: Magma Blast
skills.raw_description:
Attacks all enemies 2 times. Each hit has a 50% chance of placing a [Bomb] that detonates after 3 turns.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +10%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +15%
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Set Ablaze
skills.raw_description: Has an 80% chance of placing two [Bomb] debuffs on each enemy that detonate after 2 turns when this Champion dies.
